pages.text: The $(item)Sigil of the Green Grove$() is an item that has multiple uses. Crafted in an array with a $(item)Growth Reagent$() and a $(item)Reinforced Slate$(), the sigil can use your $(thing)Soul Network$()'s $(blood)LP$() to nourish and grow nearby plants.

pages.title: 綠叢試劑儀式
pages.text: 這是綠叢印記矩陣，以及它的主要用途。

如果你手持印記對著一個 $(2)IGrowable$() 的方塊對象按下[$(k:use)]，它會消耗你 $(blood)150LP$() 並對方塊施加一次骨粉效果。$(br2)然而，如果你是按住 [$(k:sneak)] 並對著空氣按下[$(k:use)]，印記會被點亮，此時意味著它處於啟動狀態，它會每 10 秒消耗 $(blood)150LP$()。它會對以玩家為中心的 7x7x5 空間內的所有方塊施加一個生長刻。喔，種馬鈴薯的時候用上這個，不錯！

As you have the $(thing)Curios API$() installed, you can equip this $(item)Sigil$() as a charm. If you want to wear more curios at once, consider using a $(l:bloodmagic:alchemy_array/sigil/holding)Sigil of Holding$(), or the $(l:bloodmagic:alchemy_array/living_equipment/armor_upgrades/curios_sockets)Socketed Upgrade$() for your $(l:bloodmagic:alchemy_array/living_equipment/living_basics)Living Armour$().
